snippet.title: Horizon Chase 2 Launch Trailer | Out Now on PlayStation 4 & 5 and Xbox Series & One
snippet.description:
Speed towards the victory and get ready to burn rubber! Assemble your arcade crew together and embark on this new tour around the World with #HorizonChase2. With online multiplayer support on all game modes, a brand-new customization feature and new visuals showcasing a beautifully crafted, vibrant and dynamic world, the evolution of arcade racing is finaly available for everyone on Playstation 4, 5, Xbox One and Series!

Get Horizon Chase 2 now! 
- PS Store: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP1464-PPSA12772_00-HORIZONCHASE2000
- Microsoft Store: https://xbox.com/en-GB/games/store/horizon-chase-2/9NJHW559VHDB/0010
- Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/horizon-chase-2
- Nintendo eShop: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/horizon-chase-2-switch/
 
Follow HC2 on Social Media:
Twitter: http://twitter.com/horizonchase
Facebook: http://facebook.com/HorizonChase
Instagram: http://instagram.com/horizon_chase
Discord: https://discord.gg/HorizonChase
